name: Fruit Blast: Fun Match 3 Games
description:
Fruit Blast is an addictive fruit​ match game! It is one of the most popular fruit game! Simply match 3 fruits which are alike and burst it.

Try to solve the levels by reaching tasty goals.

================== How to play Fruit Burst ===================
-- Connect 3 or more fruits to blast! 
-- Complete different goals to pass the level, you will find this game is so addicting!
-- Tap on more than one adjacent fruit which is alike to destroy them.
-- The more fruits you destroy once a time, the more you will get scores.
-- No time limit.

=================== Fruit Blast – Features =====================
--20 + juicy levels of the best connect game with different challenging goals
--Easy and fun to play, master your skills even with more fun!
--Play and compete with your friends
--Free to play on different devices
--Keep updating new juicy levels and surprises
--Great for killing boring time
--Exercise and also relax your brain
